page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF GRAHAM
page.content: On Sunday 16th June 1985 at 7.45 I woke up and had my breakfast and at 8.15 me and my Dad went to the dump and got rid of some garden rubbish. On the way back we stopped to book a court. When we were there we found some tins for the village fete. When we got home we had a drink of '7-up' in the garden. A few minutes after having a drink I went for a walk with my Dad and practised golf with a real golf ball. For lunch we had chicken salad. During the afternoon I played tin can alley, golf and tennis. Katie and I cycled to the garage to get some firelighters for Alan and David's barbecue. After tea we packed our sleeping bags to go to Felicity's house. I came home at half past eleven.
